title: 03/24/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/24/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys begin talking about tomorrow's NBA trade deadline. Chris Mannix joined us to discuss why Rudy Gobert should be an MVP candidate. While the NBA is at a crucial part of its season, the NCAA Tournament has gotten to the Sweet 16, including the 11th seeded Syracuse Orange. The father-son duo of Jim and Buddy Boeheim zoomed in to the show to talk about the dynamic of coaching your son on a team as well as the run that the Orange have made. Lastly, the birthday boy and celebrity bracket leader Jim Parsons joined Dan in the final hour to talk about his strategy to picking teams in the tournament and a role on a popular show that he didn't get.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys begin talking about tomorrow's NBA trade deadline. Chris Mannix joined us to discuss why Rudy Gobert should be an MVP candidate. While the NBA is at a crucial part of its season, the NCAA Tournament has gotten to the Sweet 16, including the 11th seeded Syracuse Orange. The father-son duo of Jim and Buddy Boeheim zoomed in to the show to talk about the dynamic of coaching your son on a team as well as the run that the Orange have made. Lastly, the birthday boy and celebrity bracket leader Jim Parsons joined Dan in the final hour to talk about his strategy to picking teams in the tournament and a role on a popular show that he didn't get.
